about_the_game:
"MANAGE YOUR OWN FOOTBALL PITCH COMPLEX!"

"Football Pitch Simulator" invites you on an exciting journey to manage your own football pitch empire! This game not only lets you manage your pitches but also requires you to make strategic decisions to keep your customers happy and maximize your profits.

Upgrade Your Pitches

"Improve various details of your football pitches, such as the ground, fences and walls."

Repair Football Pitches

"Repair worn-out pitches, renew floors and freshen their paintwork. Both satisfy your customers and improve the quality of your business!"

Manage a Market

"Stock the shelves, set prices and hire a cashier! Run a perfect convenience store in your sports facility."

Expand Your Business

"Expand your football pitch complex and attract more customers by opening new areas!"

"Football Pitch Simulator" is a perfect experience for fans of football management, strategy, and simulation games. With stunning graphics, deep gameplay mechanics, and various management options, this game invites you to build and manage your own football pitch empire!

⚽🛠️Add to Your Wishlist Now!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.14 Mojave or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500 @ 3.3 GHz (or equivalent AMD processor)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M370X / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950M or better
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.2 GHz (4 CPUs) or Apple M1 chip
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700 or Apple M1 GPU
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
